Package edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing

Annotation Type Processor

@Documented
@Target(TYPE)
@Retention(RUNTIME)
public @interface Processor
Annotation which marks a EventProcessor or DocumentProcessor as available for service discovery registration.

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements 
    Modifier and Type Required Element Description
    java.lang.String value
    The processor name.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements 
    Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
    KeyValue[] additionalMetadata
    Any additional metadata.
    java.lang.String description
    A short description of what the processor does.
    java.lang.String humanName
    A human-readable name for the processor.
    LabelIndexDescription[] inputs
    Descriptions of the input label indices.
    LabelIndexDescription[] outputs
    Descriptions of the output label indices.
    ParameterDescription[] parameters
    Descriptions of the processor's parameters.

  • Element Details

    • value

      java.lang.String value
      The processor name. This will be the default name that the processor identifies under with service discovery. It should be a valid dns path component, i.e. only consisting of alphanumeric characters and dashes.
      Returns:
      String processor name.

    • humanName

      java.lang.String humanName
      A human-readable name for the processor.
      Returns:
      String human readable name like "Part of Speech Tagger"
      Default:
      ""

    • description

      java.lang.String description
      A short description of what the processor does.
      Returns:
      String description.
      Default:
      ""

    • parameters

      ParameterDescription[] parameters
      Descriptions of the processor's parameters.
      Returns:
      Array of parameter descriptions.
      Default:
      {}

    • inputs

      LabelIndexDescription[] inputs
      Descriptions of the input label indices.
      Returns:
      Array of descriptions for the label indices the processor uses.
      Default:
      {}

    • outputs

      LabelIndexDescription[] outputs
      Descriptions of the output label indices.
      Returns:
      Array of descriptions for label indices the processor creates.
      Default:
      {}

    • additionalMetadata

      KeyValue[] additionalMetadata
      Any additional metadata.
      Returns:
      Array of Key-Value pairs.
      Default:
      {}
